thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 2 of 62
thread.title: JUDOKICK

author: JUDOKICK
title: JUDOKICK
text: I had an issue in one of my browsers not being able to use a plugin supplied with one of the templates I purchased. Maya was here to save the day. Amidst my panic, she calmly asked for the login and went to work. Autopiloted the whole thing and went about updating to the latest plugin. Even showed me how to update it in the future. Super fast and super awesome. TemplateMonster does not disappoint when it comes to customer service. If you want a wizard, ask for Maya.
